message: Hello VHTs. This group is for Seeta Nazigo and Makata VHTs. Dorothy is the supervisor.
Luke and Qiana I will be at Seeta Nazigo at 3pm to do a household visit with each of you.
Where are you now?
Welcome Harriet
Thank you very much
Hi My Dear How are you?
I am good thank you Harriet. I am just at Seeta Nazigo HC now. I am just about to do some visits with Luke and Qiana.
Luke did a home visit today. Remember to take your time when doing the history and exam and record things accurately!
Send me the names of those who are going to do the home  visit tomorrow.
Tomorrow we have just Kavule and Kirujja VHTs doing home visits. Isabella and Harriet.
Ok
Ok
Keep up the good work. There are a lot of people in Seeta Nazigo and Makata who need your help

Remember ... Each time you recruit a new house hold get written consent. We will be providing you with two forms which need to be signed by your houses the first time you visit them. One is in English the other is in Luganda. Once the head of house has signed the consent form once they don't need to sign it again over the next 6 months
Francesca we already went back home.
Dr. the other patient you gave money to go to the health center, went to Mukono HC 4 and they took 7000 from her and said they are going to cut off the leg.
They said they will cut off leg.
So have they done that or not? What has she decided. We want her to be ok.

For the benefit of you guys. Luke found a patient yesterday on a home visit with a very bad infection of the leg. The patient was going to stay at home but we advised them to go to Mukono District Health Center 4 in town and be seen by the doctors. This is important as the infection was very bad and the woman could die if this spread to the bone. Some were worried about the doctors wanting to ask for money. Remember that the government health centers are free. Anyone who asks for money should be directly challenged and the patient should take the doctors name. They should report this to you as VHT and you report to OmniMed. We will then make sure this is seen to by the District Health Officer Dr. Tumashabe. Remember, VHTs are the voice of the people.
Andrew I ask for forgiveness, I know I am always rushing but I know I am doing the work well and I can change.
It looks a bit like this. Anyone who has an injury like this needs to go to hospital urgently and be seen by a doctor.
I have seen the photo - it seems the person is so sick. They might cut the leg off.
She is going back to the hospital today.
You forgive me Andrew for what has not gone right.
He has forgiven you Luke.
Morning VHT members
Good morning
We will see you and Isabella today at makata Primary school at 2pm for home visits. Please bring your books , otoscope and a pen
Thanks for reminding me.
Remember ! Sick patient who you can't deal with in the community (EMOJIS) --> send to a doctor at the health center (EMOJIS)
Any corruption don't accept it (EMOJIS). Take the name of the doctor (EMOJIS) and report it  (EMOJIS)
Welcome Isabella (Emoji)
Hello VHTs I hope you are all good. Respect for all your work.

Greetings. Thanks for the work you are doing. Starting from next week we are going to start having cases and questions which we will give you. You have to reply. What you have to do is to read your booklets and the papers that you are given. Whoever has a question we are ready to answer.
Harriet and Isabella did their visits today and are using WhatsApp.

We talked about the idea of creating a list of your houses and marking when you visit them how many people are in the households and how many you examined. That way you can be more organised and make sure you don't miss anyone off.
Thank you Isabella and Harriet
Gebaleko Dorothy
Ok dear. Also well done.
Andrew, Dorothy wants to know about the ear washout program for one of the girls from her households because it's tomorrow.
OK I can meet her in the morning if she likes??
Dorothy did you wash out the patients ear?
Andrew will bring all the equipment for you.
We are in the field.
Hello my VHTs, Respect for all of the work you are doing. I hope you are all well.
Welcome back Isabella and Harriet. Thanks for the work you have done today we really appreciate.

Those we are going to see the following week get ready. Don't forget your otoscopes. The other thing is you should read the manual we gave you because we are going to begin giving you case studies and questions next week.
Welcome back Catherine and Andrew

Thank you Isabella and Harriet for your excellent work today. You did a good job at taking the consent and doing the exams and recording it in the books. If it is easier for you maybe keep the forms and drop them off at omnimed rather than seeta nazigo health center if it is closer for you? Also maybe consider making a list of your households and writing down when you have visited them, how many people were in that household and how many you examined.  That way we can be organised
Health worker, are we supposed to bring the papers the patients were filling?
The ones you remove from the books?
Even those you filled
Isabella I appreciate but lets do it again
Thank you for the work you have done for them because they have benefited a lot.
Doctor do we write all the households?
Thank you Harriet. Well done today and thank you for your effort. Webale Nyo
You write all of them and then you specify the ones you have already visited and also write the number of people there plus the ones you have examined.
Dorothy. We are at Seeta Nazigo. Are you coming ?
Yes
Dorothy did an ear washout and dry mopping this morning. She performed very well.
Dorothy please prompt VHTs to use this group and create home lists.

New bit of information from Simon and Teresa. If a patient has a lot of wax but no symptoms -- no treatment needed If a patient has a lot of wax but has symptoms e.g. ringing in ears or pain then they need Olive oil drops 3 times a day for 5 days then washout and dry mopping
Ok

Next week schedule as follows: Monday 10am - Luke we will meet and see the lady who needs washout and the young boy who will need a referral. 2pm - Gordon and Oliver to do observed home visits. 1 home each where we will observe you taking a history, performing otoscopy and doing whispered hearing test. Tuesday 1pm. Harriet and Isabella we will meet you at makata primary to do the ear washouts. 2pm - Karl and Jane. We will meet you at Makata Primary School  to do your home visits. Wednesday 2pm - Nora and Patricia we will meet you at Seeta Nazigo HC III to do your home visits. Thursday 2pm - Francesca and Matthew we will meet you at omnimed Makata to do your home visits. For all home visits bring you books, charged otoscopes and phones. Have a nice weekend.

I am just encouraging you to continue doing your good work, our bosses have been appreciating our work. I also encourage you not to delete the messages we are being sent. Like that one about Teresa. It can help you in the field. You can refer to the messages and know what to do. Lets also keep up writing down the households we have. The people in the houses. That way you will know the people in the house.

Another thing - some of the VHTs have a problem differentiating the WhatsApp groups we have. If you have anything to share with all your VHTs put it in the SN/Makata group so that everyone will get your message. If you go in the field and have any challenge you can share the question. That way we will respond to you.
And if you have a fellow VHT that you have worked with, you can just go into the contacts and look for the VHT. Then send a private message.
Thank you Dorothy
Ok Sir
I assure you my friends were  missing things that were going around the world. Now I really appreciate Dr. Andrew
Harriet you said you are going on home visits, but how are going to do it? Should I join you?
Doctor Andrew  thank you for what you are doing. People in my community have appreciated everything, thank you so much.
Isabella can you join me for home visiting during the day?
Harriet I won't be in position to make it because I have a church meeting
Thank you too Harriet for trying to go on a home visit. Its a nice idea actually to go in pairs and observe each other. It maybe also might thinks more interesting
I were telling my colleagues to organise and start supervision for our homestead as we were doing before.
Thank you Edward for arranging this and for your leadership ssebo. Have a nice weekend
My VHTs keep up the hard work  let us be sharing ideas and encouraging each other.
Thank you Nora

Great. That is a brilliant idea Nora. this group is ideal for sharing such message of encouragement and ideas about how we can improve things. I know the kavuule and kirujja butoke group are going in pairs on their visits and also that they are making house hold lists and checking them off.
Thank you Doctor.
I agree with what you said in the group. We should use this to work closer with each other and learn from each other.
When will you accompany me and Harriet on our home visits?
Thanks  for the work you are doing. Thanks for the home visits. I hope they went on well. I pray for you to do well in the questions.
Let it be Wednesday coz most pipo meet at the Health center at 2:00pm. Thanks.
Jane can you let me know if you have any problem in being offline because we need you to keep following as well

Yes. Jane needs to go to mukono to the airtel\mtn store to get a new SIM card for her number. Hers is not working. A new sim card is in the region of 2000-4000 shillings. She should use part of the 20,000 I gave her to do this. It is important she is online so she can be kept up to date and so we can help her. Can someone urge her to do this? Also Qiana are you OK? We haven't heard from you
I will try tomorrow to see her physically and talk to her about that issue. Thanks.

Greetings all my friends thanks for all of todays work. Welcome back. I have sent you these pictures to see so that you can remember. I know it will help you. For those who have not yet gone to ear washout.
I wish you all a good Sunday. Good night.
Thank you Edward. We appreciate your supervision and assistance.
Dorothy, I am so happy for what you have given us. Thanks very much for sharing that video. We have been waiting for it. We are so grateful that you have shared this.

I am saying Catherine thanks for the work you have done. Showing us these photos. We had forgotten. Thanks you. These videos will help us on our home visit. God bless you. Have a nice weekend. May god grant you.
Thank you Dorothy !!!
Thanks Luke and also Catherine for the good work. I am now on WhatsApp just I have been sick these days.
I have seen all the message though
Tomorrow (Monday) Luke we will meet at Seeta Nazigo to see the little boy at 10am. Gordon and Oliver meet at seeta nazigo at 2pm to do home visits.
Gordon please go to someone who has pain the ear.
Well done team
Matthew remember about meeting on Thursday at 2pm at the Organisation in Makata and  please keep time.
Please keep this group for work purposes and sending helpful photos only. Thanks.
Also Oliver is everything OK? We have not heard from you.

We have collected forms at the health center from Dorothy; Edward ; Luke. Well done to these 3 VHTs. This is excellent. Please all other VHTs drop your forms in the box at the health center each Monday . The pink form goes in the box ; the blue one goes to the patient. And you keep the white form in your book
My phone is on. Just that I feel pain in my jaw. Thanks so much Dorothy and Edward for giving us the information about this report. I have seen it.
Good morning. We will start the cases today . We also have not heard from Karl , Qiana or Jane. Please could you guys remember to contribute to this group
I didn't manage to see Jane as I promised but I hope to see her today at the burial ceremony at Seeta Nazigo at 2:00pm. I shall tell her what to do.
Try to remind our colleagues to bring their forms  at the Health centre as we were told. Thanks.

Dorothy. The lady you referred called Ursula. I agree she has a bad right ear. However the history said the hearing from whispered voice test was normal. In the right ear it was not. She is unable to hear. This lady had a very poor right ear and will need referring to a specialist at mulago.
I will liaise with you about whether she should go to old or new mulago on Monday morning. She is aware she needs to attend.
Remember!! Both of these consent forms MUST be filled out by the head of the house hold when you first visit them. Without them you cannot see the family and will endanger the project.
We are here at the HC with Andrew
Thank you. We will start Gordon and Oliver's home visits in 5 minutes.
Learning how to use WhatsApp.

If you aren't sure how to use messages on WhatsApp please inform your supervisor , Dorothy. Matthew, Gordon, Oliver  Francesca and Harriet you have been too quiet. You need to engage in the group so we know you are doing work and don't have any problems.

Edward the patient Veronica who you referred has got ear wax in both ears. I have given her the olive oil drops and she needs to have a washout and dry mopping in 4 days (Friday). If she comes to seeta nazigo on Friday can you do this at 2pm?
Thanks Dr Andrew I will be there and do it.
Oliver is doing his home visit now .
Thanks Edward.
Greetings all members of SN. Dr. Andrew said that it is not good to send patients without reviewing them or without letting him know because today we were supposed to work on 2 but we found 6.
The 2 patients they have been referred to Mulago.
Harriet could you escort me I have a patient at around 4pm. How is that.
Friday I will go with Oliver to do a repeat washout of the lady we treated today and to see the girl with the discharging ear at 1pm.
Isabella go on to WhatsApp right now.
Karl and Qiana .. Is everything OK? We have not heard from you both...

Well done Oliver and Gordon today. You both did well. Gordon that was excellent work to identify the otitis media and treat appropriately. Follow her up in 1 week and if she isn't getting better after 4 weeks she will need to go to mulago.
Have are you members. Am on air.
Also Gordon we need to supply you with consent forms and treatment kits. We can give you this tomorrow.
Well done VHTs
Thank you all for the work u have done including Andrew, Catherine, Bryan, Oliver and Gordon
Today I worked in Makata with Gordon and Dr. Andrew, Bryan and Catherine. The work has gone on well. Gordon has done well. We are still going on.
Thank you Matthew. Thank you Gordon. Keep up the good work.
You are welcome, thanks your work was really impressive, we want others to be like you.
Luke. Your patient (1 year old boy) who is going to mulago on Monday need to go to old mulago ent clinic in the morning. Please make that clear to them.
Jane has come. She is at the health centre and she needs help on her WhatsApp.
We saw Jane at 2pm. She seemed able to use the WhatsApp.
Did you see the questions?
Reply to them so we see where we stand.
Please friends lets try and reply to the questions.
Thank you for encouraging them Edward.
Good morning, today at 1pm Harriet and Isabella we are going to meet at Makarta Primary School to do an ear washout.

There are people who are so silent and we are not hearing from them at all for example in the other Case group that we are all meant to participate, VHTs like Patricia, Qiana. Partake like us all please.
Jane I know you are in class now. Tell Qiana to enter also we want her to be part of us and participate. Thanks.
We are at Makata Primary ready to go on home visits. Karl is here. We are waiting for you
Karl performing a whisper hearing test. Well done Karl. He has found a lady with hearing loss.
We will reply to the questions
Sorry for not replying to the questions. I had no power on my phone and the power bank was dead.
Luke does not agree with Francesca's excuse, he's trying to blame her.
Wait for the photo.
This is Luke, my reply to the question is doing the ear washout then dry mopping then re-examine again to see if it is clean now. I also continue to follow up.
Isabella and Harriet got a new patient called Wlma and she has puss in her right ear, I think we need to look at her also tomorrow.
OK. Thanks. I can come see these patients at 11am tomorrow.

Some important messages. This is really important so if you are mentioned make sure you take action as we will be following this up. If you have seen a patient and identified a problem you must give them treatment and follow up to see if it has worked. If it has not worked you must refer them and make sure we know about it. 1. Dorothy. A. You saw patient called Xander, 30 years old, male on 6th February. They had right sided ear wax. You said you gave olive oil and they needed a washout on Saturday. Please confirm when you have done this and the outcome. B. You referred a 53 year old lady who came to see you who had been using antibiotic drops in her right ear. She was seen by us at Seeta nazigo yesterday. She has some hearing loss and some wax in the ear. She needs to be followed up on Friday and assessed to see if she needs a referral to mulago. 2. Luke. A. You saw a 1 year old boy. He has a left ear drum perforation. We washout and dried. We gave antibiotic ear drops. Dr. Zanetta will see him Monday morning at mulago old hospital ent outpatient clinic. Please make sure mum takes him and report back to us the outcome. B. You saw a 5 year old girl with her grandmother yesterday. She needs a follow up on Friday morning with us to see if the antibiotics are making things better. If not she needs a referral to mulago. C. You saw a 69 year old lady on 6th February. Her image has been reviewed by Dr. Arthur. He said it is just wax and itching should settle down over time. Please reassure her. 3. Gordon. A. You saw the 21 year old girl yesterday with the perforation of the ear drum. We need to follow her up Monday afternoon. All other VHTs keep up your good work.
We are mapping out all of the patients who need review so that no one is forgotten or slips through the net.
We are going at 10.10am to assess Karl's patient. At 11am we will go assess the two patients who Harriet and Isabella saw yesterday.

Karl I have arranged an audiological review for your two patients. I will send you details of the appointment . it will be in Kampala and they will have to cover their own transport there however I will pay for their assessment so this will be free. After the assessment has been done they will assess for suitability for a hearing aide
Luke did you get any message from Gordon. He is saying his phone has a problem. It is like the messages are not coming. Since morning he's not got a message.

Gordon - his messages are not in the group. Let him go to the group which has a profile picture of VHTs. Now here  you are using this big group. You need to use an alternative group. I have told him to use that other group. Any problems just let me know. I can help others. If there are problems tell him to come to me and I will help him.
Francesca - tell Gordon to switch off his phone, for 2 minutes. Then let him switch it on again. It will work again.
Jane we have not seen you on the VHT case group, go and reply to the questions.
Gordon  thinks his phone has a fault since he hasn't received any messages since morning.
Ok. I will see Gordon at 2pm tomorrow and try fix it.
Tell him to make sure it is not on aeroplane mode.
It is very unlikely to be broken but thanks for letting us know Francesca.
Dorothy is advising Gordon to first switch it off for about three minutes then switch it on again because she had the same problem .
Oliver is answering the question. He says he will first wash the boy's ears then after put antibiotics.
Great. OK Catherine if you are able to give the correct answer now to everyone in the case study group that would be great.
Oliver please put your answers in the case study group. Thanks.
He says if there's no difference after one week, he refers the boy to a specialist in a bigger hospital before it worsens.
I request Catherine to translate Dr. Andrew's messages to Luganda
What Catherine is writing in English is for Andrew, not the VHTs
So Mr. Luke what needs to be translated will be translated for you.
Nora today explaining how to use antibiotics. Remember: always ask about patient allergies
Well done my fellow VHTs. I want to direct you how we get videos - you tap in messages, then click down - you see the word play. On that circle - when you click it - the video will start.

Greetings Dr. Andrew you told us on Thursday that patients should be coming to SN. Like the old man with wax and another lady who had a child and the child who had pus in the ear that we washed out. Her parent came here. The parent came today to tell us what to do. I want to know what time you will arrive.

Now Catherine I request you to inform Dr. Andrew. There is a girl that they have told to come back today. Her parent brought her. That photo of the girl is here in the group. I examined her, she had a perf and wax. They have brought the girl back. The lady is asking what time will you arrive.
Agree. Any one who is having problems with your phone just come to omnimed between now and 2pm
Some people are not replying to the questions. People from the other group are active but not us.
Which people are you meaning, maybe say their names so they know.
My fellow VHTs, especially of Kirijja Butoke, do your work of house visits and also take note of the people in each household. You know that I appreciate the work and please keep up.
Dorothy I have just come back online, The photos you are talking about I can't see them. Tell me how I can look for them on my phone - this is Oliver Seeta Nazigo.

Greetings everyone, well-done and thanks for responding to the questions, I encourage everyone to love the work we do, but the most important thing that shows that we are working is to bring the forms in the box, our bosses checked in the box yesterday but they didn't find any form, so I encourage you to bring the forms, if you can't manage to  bring the forms and there is someone who is coming to Seeta now like those who stay together in Kavule you can all give to Isabella or Edward to take the forms in the box and you save your time, please let's keep working hard, nice weekend.
My fellow VHTs I have a problem with my eyes - when I look into the phone my eyes itch a lot. Is there anything I can do?

Is everything OK Jane? This message doesn't make sense. Also please remember that on Monday you need to go back to see the 53 year old man we saw this week to do a wash out. If you want us to accompany you please let us know.
Also has anyone heard from Qiana ?? We have not received any messages from her.
I have not heard from her. I don’t know what is wrong.
Jane what does your message mean? What do you want to know about?
Send us an Audio to let us know what you want .
I was with Qiana trying to teach her how to send messages so that message was just a trial one.
Thanks Edward.
She says she's still learning how to use the phone. Also, you told her not to do any home visits without accompanying her. That's what was stopping her. I just got to see her today as well.
Ok Jane. We will go to your home visit on Monday.
If you are waiting for a white man, does that mean you don't reply on any message or go on any home visits.

I send my appreciation to my group mates and the Makata/ Seeta Nazigo group for the    work you have done. Thanks also go Dr. Andrew for your effort  and time for this project I also thank Catherine and Bryan for proper translation. God bless you and good night.
Thank you for replying to the question in the case group. For those who have not been able to do , next time enquire from your fellow VHTs so that you know what to do next time. Thank you again
You are most welcome Edward, thanks for the hard work and all the regular responses. Let's all keep the good work and learn from each other.

I thank all the group members of Kirijja Butooke, Makata Seeta Nazigo for participating and responding to the cases, let's be together even for the next time when we get another question let's participate, where we don't understand let's ask our friends, we were told to read the manuals so that we prepare for the next program, thank you so much. I also thank Dr Andrew, and his translators Bryan and Catherine, thank you so much, you have tried so much to translate what is right from what we have been saying for example changing from English to Luganda and the vice versa

VHTs on the side of where Qiana is please go to help her. Also Qiana should also look for the VHTs around her to help her how to respond to the questions because it doesn't take long for someone to learn, am not saying it in a bad way, but as VHTs of Kirijja Butooke, you have to work together in pairs so as you go on home visits and train her so that she can learn.
Thank you all. Nice weekend
Qiana I am requesting you come on Tuesday to SN HC III

On Monday I'll be at the health center 10am-12.30pm to review any cases you wish me to see. I'm then able to go on home visits Monday , Tuesday and Thursday between 2pm and 5pm. If anyone wants Catherine, Bryan and I to accompany them please let me know (especially those without treatment kits yet)

Also Francesca please inform the lady with hearing loss who we saw on the home visit that we have booked her a specialist hearing assessment in Kampala at 1pm on Wednesday. Catherine and I can transport her and we will be leaving makata at 9.45am
I have got the information as you told Francesca, but am asking about the other child they had referred to Mulago, is he also supposed to go to Mulago on Wednesday?
I have received the information, I think the patient will come at Omni Med.

My fellow VHTs let's observe about where we send the messages when informing others, like Mr. Matthew you could have put your issue in the group of Seeta Nazigo and Makata group. The problems we find when e have gone on house visits are the ones we are supposed to share on the VHT case group, but when we keep doing the same mistake as they are always telling us, it is not good let's observe before sharing messages, but issues with illnesses when you get the patient are the ones to go in the case group, whereas informing others where you will meet and any other information should be  written in Seeta Nazigo Makata group, thank you so much.
Thank you Isabella

Also Karl for the two deaf patients we saw last week please inform them we have booked a specialist assessment in Kampala at 1pm on Wednesday. Catherine and I can drive them and we will leave Seeta Nazigo at 10am.
Good morning VHTs and thanks for your work, what am asking is that, do you go on examining people's ears as you leave them their or you also treat them? Someone please answer me.
Sorry Mr. Matthew about the pain in your leg, I have just read the message now I had no battery on my phone, but please go and see a specialist and they assess it.

Oliver you told us that you have a problem with your eyes and that you are unable to read at night but now you are telling us that you have just read the message, are you lying to us or you are telling us the truth?
I had no charge on my phone, but I have to do all it takes to read the  messages shared on the phone but my eyes have a problem.

It's me Harriet. I thank Dr. Andrew for the work he has done. Thanks for not letting us down. Each time we need you, we are able to hear from you. Thanks so much. Thanks for the air time too. May God reward you. Bryan, thank you guys for not giving us hard time. You care and don't complain. Catherine, we really appreciate your services. Keep it up. Continue to treat our people and God's name will be glorified. Amen.
Thank you for appreciating Harriet. Thank you too for the work you are doing.
Thank you Harriet. It is an honour to work with the VHTs. We have a great team.

Thank you Dorothy for your clarification, but just a reminder, the VHT CASE GROUP is meant for learning. You will be responding to questions which will be put in the VHT case group. Even if you go in a household and you get a patient who needs referral or any special attention please let it still be shared in your groups of Seeta Nazigo and Makata group or Kirijja Butooke / Kavule group. Thank you
Good morning friends, how do you see if we go like in churches, and among the people neighbouring our villages we work from and we teach them about ear diseases?

Good morning Bryan, I received both the audio message and the written one about the other patients.  I have informed the household head and at 10am they will be at the Health centre where you will find them, thank you so much.
No!! Monday at 9am to ent clinic at old mulago
As in tomorrow.
It is very important he goes like I said last week. They are expecting him. The doctors name is Dr. Zanetta
Good. Thanks. Please stress to her that we will be departing makata at 10am as we have to be on time to the appointment in Kampala. Thank you Francesca

You examine them. If you have a treatment kit and you think they have a simple problem treat. However if you don't have a treatment kit yet or you think they have a bigger problem refer to us to see them. Also everyone should be recording whoever they see in their books even if they don't need treatment. That way we can have a clear record of who needs and who doesn't need follow up.

If you don't have a treatment  kit yet it is because either a. In the tests you needed extra assessment or b. On home visits you have not made correct decisions or recorded things poorly. We will continue to assist you but we want to make sure things are done properly as this is a very important role.
Mr Andrew thanks for your concern about the patients.

OK Oliver. If you are struggling to read messages please let us know since otherwise we can only assume you are not receiving or replying. We have to see the lady we saw last week who has ear wax that you gave olive oil to in order to do her washout. Does Tuesday afternoon work?

I have home visit slots available Monday, Tuesday and Thursday at 2pm. I would like one of those to be Qiana and Jane and one to be Oliver and Luke and one to be Patricia since those 6 don't have treatment kits yet. Please choose a date and I will attend with you

Well-done Mr. Edward, I had an idea about making pairs me and you so that we can go on home visits as we learn together because  Jane whom they gave me is far from me in Byafula village am unable to get in touch with her, how do you see that?
Its a good idea, I will get time like on Thursdays where am not so busy so that we can make arrangements and we fulfil that.

I have got the information but I have a problem with my phone - it looses network. Even if the network comes, it is slow, the messages freeze. I don’t know what I can do with that problem. If you have had this I request you help me and update my internet as it gets lost. Last time it was out the whole day - morning to evening. I don't know if it is possible for you to come and help me.

I've got the information Luke, maybe you have locked your internet or put it on flight safe mode, or maybe there are some apps you have opened making it freeze which have become a problem to its speed. When I come to Seeta I am going to see it and make it right for you. You must have many irrelevant apps - I am coming to see the problem.

Mr. Edward, the idea of taking the training in church is very good because there are always many people in church and it is easy to get them as compared to house to house visit, it is a very good idea and it will help, thank you have a nice weekend.
Great ideas. Well done Karl

I was thinking that Matthew needs to be helped, and informed on where to write his issues, we shall be happy if those around him direct him where to put the messages, that the VHT case group is for learning, let him use the Seeta Nazigo group. It is true he has a problem with his leg and I have ever seen him at the health centre looking for treatment. It doesn't look look when you open messages in VHT case group and you find Matthew talking about himself alone or Gordon doing the same. I have only mentioned the two because am always making jokes with them but even others, let's write in the right groups in order to get good communication. Thank you
Bryan I don’t know if my first message got to you but I am going to see that lady, she can tell me which date she can be at home to see that we make a follow up because she works from very far.

About the issue of the eyes, especially when I look into light or in my phone, when I am trying to read some things I can't see well and feel itching in my eyes and get tears. That is the only problem I have.

Greetings, my fellow VHTs I am just reminding all those who have a programme of going to Mulago to keep time so they don't miss it. They have to keep time not to destroy this programme as it just the beginning. Since they are the first people going they have to keep time, because there will be others going. Health worker Bryan, thank you so much. The information is reaching us very well. But for me as Francesca I will move with doctor on this Thursday. I don't know where we are going to meet.

Remember everyone I will be at seeta nazigo HC III tomorrow morning from 10am until 12.30pm and can review any patients who need to be seen. Bryan I have heard the message, this phone has been disturbing me, it had no network and the messages were not coming and going through. But I will work tomorrow with Andrew because tomorrow I will have time.
And I have just brought the phone to Dorothy who has fixed it.
Harriet where are?!, you come and we go in the field, come and we go on a house visit  because I can't see you.

Hi Qiana. You said you have a lady with ear wax who can't hear. For her we can see her tomorrow if you want to go with me on home visits. Remember I will be at seeta nazigo HC III tomorrow at 10am until 12.30pm for any cases you wish for me to review.
Bryan, I have understood well what to do, but I want thank you so much for your care and making sure we get the information in time, thanks for the work. Am Oliver

Hi vhts. I am at the health center in seeta nazigo but perhaps there are no patients for me to review ? Also I have some slightly bad news. The staff at Omni Med have told me that this afternoon they need to use the car since their car is broken. I am able to see patients around makata this afternoon instead and can go with you tomorrow at 2pm and then Oliver and Luke at 4pm.
If Francesca would like me to see patients or do a hone visit I can do so today around makata.
Thans for the message Bryan I got it, am ready, he will get us at 1pm in the centre
Thanks. I will actually just meet you at your home at 2pm Francesca . is that ok?
Good morning Karl. Where are your patients? Andrew is waiting for them but he can not see them. I request you get in touch with them, because it is already time for the appointment.
Edward I am also on the way coming. I am with a patient who has pus in the ear, I am on the way coming but if you at the health center you can send me a boda so that I can be there on time.
Harriets patients are 2. I am coming with them. We are about to reach.
What about the two patients - do you know anything about them?
We examined them - we are waiting for them on Wednesday. They are not for today.
OK thanks Isabella. I'm just in the youth corner.
It would work for me well, but where doctor has gone to find Gordon that is where my patient is that I am going to examine.
We are here in the road waiting for him with Gordon
The rain is bad. I will try come up soon but I will be on foot. I think Gordon is coming too.
They are with Gordon in the centre, sorry Andrew for the car
The trading center ? I will be delayed as I need to walk up there.
Yes
Ok. I'll be 20 minutes.

I got here expecting to find my patient but she's nowhere to be seen. I was supposed to wash her ears and we had an appointment at 2pm. I hear she's gone to Seeta to pay school fees for her children. I also had to tell X about the Wednesday program. Let me wait for her. If I find time, I may also come back at 5pm.
Bryan we shall be there. We shall also keep time so we can see that patient we worked on. I am actually already at the health centre.

VHTs, I encourage you to read all messages that you receive. And now Qiana, there's a message up there that says they won't be working today from Andrew. I therefore encourage you to read each message you receive.

Dr. Andrew, this is Harriet. Thanks dear for caring. Thanks for taking your time to check on our patients. May God bless you. You want our people to be healthy. We really appreciate. May God make you victorious and also for those people's car to get in good condition. Amen.
Thank you Francesca and Gordon for your hard work today. Gordon did very well and found a perforation in a young girl . he has treated her correctly
Thank you too.
Greetings to you Harriet. You shouldn't put that issue on the case group. You're supposed to put it on this group of kirijja butoke/ kavule that brings us together.
Such cases shouldn't be put there. Cases to be put there include the problems we encounter, seeking for advice, questions e.t.c.

Thanks Edward but these groups are confusing. You think you're writing in kirijja butoke only to be told you're writing in the VHT case group. Now Mr, forgive me. I still haven't mastered using this phone but I thought I had sent the message to kirijja butoke group.
No problem. You will catch up slowly by slowly. We are also challenged by many things and are still learning
Harriet you can come. I was still doing a few things but you can come so we get done with that too.
Luke have you heard that you and I will be visiting people in our respective areas? If you have then let me know.
Patricia what were you telling me? I was rushing to go to work, because my bosses badly needed me but you can repeat it for me this evening.

I thank Andrew for introducing us to the internet. Some of us didn't know we would ever get to use it. Thanks Andrew together with omni med and now we are also modern. May God bless you and keep up the good heart.

Oliver they told us tomorrow we will meet at 4pm. You must have a patient to visit. Because the other person said she has already been using her olive oil you gave her, and now the days of passed you need to do the washout. I also have 3 patients who need to be seen. There is a child who has water in the ear, with wounds outside the ear. Then there is an old woman with too much wax, with a hearing loss. Those are the people I am expecting to work on. That is my part. I don't know how many patients you are expecting on your part. We can move together - me you Patricia and work together as three. We can do as Isabella does with Harriet. Or we can go with our supervisor Dorothy. Nora with you and Patricia with me. One person can look into the ear, the other checks if we are right.

What you have talked about is good. I agree. But when you are doing it we should do it for the whole day because our other jobs take time. When you have just started working in the field and someone calls you to go to another place, it gets tiring. So lets just pick a day and do it then.  I don't have any patient so lets share the ones you have.
No worries and thank you all for your hard work.

Another thing Luke, I want to know is at Seeta Nazigo how many people were given olive oil and antibiotics because I didn't do well and was not given the equipment so I want to know how many are we in Seeta Nazigo who have the equipment which is enough.

I also told you to get patients, but we can share mine if you don't have patients. Because they told us at 4pm we can use the time do to that. I have 3 people. An old woman, a child (with hearing loss and wax), then the ear has wounds on the outside. Those are the people we are going to work on. There is also a lady at Kalenzos place. We can also work on that one. One ear looks like it has water in it.

Another thing - what you have said is right. We agreed with Dorothy that we utilise one day to do all this and just work on someone's house holds. Me, I can work 2 days a week on someone's households. So we can make arrangements on various days, move around as a group of VHTs. This will be better than walking alone. Another thing we will reach a point where we are all good and we can correct each other. So what I see is that by working together we can improve each others knowledge. We can supervise each other this way.

Good morning Luke, I have one lady that I want to dry mopping on. I will also be there at 4pm so we can get tissue at James' place so we can do the dry mopping, see how her ears are etc. I gave her olive oil for 5 days. Now I want to do the washout.
Good morning Bryan. Thanks for the work you are doing. I am Patricia. I need tissue paper please to do dry mopping.

Good morning Luke. Thanks for the work you're doing. The issue you discussed with Oliver, I agree that we need to work as a group. As one person it is tiresome. It affects us so much, you have to move, sort out your children, pick up your kids from school, that means you can't see as many patients. What you talked about is so good. We can start doing it next week.

Another thing. I repeat what Oliver said. The people who received the equipment - for me I got it, Dorothy got it. If you have any issues just let me or Dorothy know so we can work together as those people in Makata are doing. I wish you well I just want us to work together.

I'm very sorry . I might be delayed today. The omnimed staff crashed the car yesterday and now it is delayed while being repaired. I'm trying my best to meet Qiana and Jane at 2pm in kirjja butoke, Luke and Oliver at 4pm in seeta nazigo and Isabella and Harriet at 5pm in makata but this may now be delayed.

From Friday I will not be here for 10 days. In that time if there are problems please ask your supervisors Dorothy or Edward to help you with any problems. If you need more supply of consent forms, antibiotic drops or olive oil please come to omnimed before Thursday. If you have patients who need review in that time please arrange with Catherine and Bryan in this group for them to go to omnimed for review or to the health center.

Well done Andrew. The lady whose child you had seen says she failed to get the money. She waited for her husband but he didn't get it so she was unable to go. Forgive her please. She really wants her child to be well but her husband. I don't know how we are going to handle it but she wants her child to get well.

Please can the following VHTs make sure they have a plan or update me for the following people: 1. Dorothy. 30 year old man seen on 6th February. Right sided ear wax. Have you washed it out and cleaned it?  53 year old female. Right sided ear wax. Can we see her on Thursday to check on how her ear is? I can be at Seeta Nazigo HC at 9am to see her. Nora - How is the 97 year old lady with the left CSOM and perforation? Have you been giving her the antibiotics? How is she now? Matthew How is the 60 year old from Makata who had left sided otitis externa? You gave her antibiotics on the 14th of February. It would be good to check up on her this week and look inside her left ear again. Gordon - Make sure you follow up the following people: the 12 year old girl and  the 50 year old woman to see if their ears are improving. We saw them yesterday so maybe go see them again on Friday. Oliver - please wash out and dry the ear of the lady we saw last week with wax. Perhaps ask Dorothy to go with you as your supervisor. I can also go on a home visit with you on Thursday afternoon if you like?

The one you mentioned is not yet done because he is not around and he is to come back on Friday. But u had told her to come on Wednesday. But if it is Thursday it's ok I will let her know tomorrow early in the morning
I was going to go Wednesday but I have now to drive to Kampala at 10am with 3 patients who need urgent hearing assessment at 1pm so I won't be around tomorrow. Thursday is the only day I can do.
Thanks. Yes. Thursday 9am I will be at Seeta Nazigo HC III from 9am - 11.30am to see patients.
It is the last chance for me to see anyone before I go away for 8 days.
After then it will be Catherine and Bryan who will see patients who need review and they will have to come to Omni Med to see them.
Alright
Hi Dr Andrew, the patient you asked me about is fine, and she hears and even she told me she is able to see, thank you so much for loving us the VHTs of Seeta Nazigo, am Nora

The truth is that the lady did not go, she told me the she had no money to take her to Mulago that why she didn't go. That her husband ran away from her, I request if possible you go with her to Mulago if you got space in your car, am waiting for the response if possible I go in the morning and I tell her to join you such the she can go to Mulago.
Sorry I was unable to see you and Jane today Qiana. We had issues with the car. I can come see you Thursday. Does that work?
Also do the following VHTs have plans for these patients or updates?: 1. Karl - 52 yo woman seen on 12th February. Given olive oil for wash out. Has she had her washout?
Oh. And finally - Harriet - did you examine the ear of the girl (27 year old female) we saw today? How was the washout? We should follow up  again when I am back on 4th March.
Morning Gordon, do you still remember the program we had made for today, I think you should hurry up and we meet the Doctor at 8am or 830 before he goes to Kampala

Morning VHTs. Doctor told me Francesca and Gordon had prepared to come meet him, but he is not here. He went to Kampala. He won't be able to come at the time you arranged. If possible come tomorrow. He isn't there today.
Ok great. She needs to keep taking antibiotic drops in the left ear for another few weeks as the infection is bad.

Unfortunately there is no space in the car for them and they missed the opportunity with the surgeon. They are now busy and have hundreds of other patients to see. Unfortunately since I was not told about this until yesterday after the appointment was missed I'm unable to solve this. They will have to wait until the surgeon from mbarara comes in March to seeta nazigo but they are only here one day and we have many other patients who need to be seen. He will get seen then but it is bad to have caused such a delay
Greetings VHTs, we have got sad news from Gordons home. He lost his mother. We are very sad for him.
Good morning my fellow VHTs, am asking our VHTs of Kirijja Butooke Jane and Qiana whether they received the messages or not yet.

If you didn't see the messages, the doctor said he is not going to be around for about 10 days, he said if we need anything for example consent forms,  ear drops or any questions we have to get in touch with Catherine and Bryan at Omni med, even when we get patients who need assessment should be brought at the organisation so that Catherine and Bryan can assess them.
I am here for one last day tomorrow (Thursday). I can be at seeta nazigo between 9am and 11.30am on Thursday to do reviews and also do home visits in the afternoon with Qiana and Jane and Oliver
Morning Dr Andrew.  Kindly remind me about the kid who has pus at Busaale the one I told you. Is he to come to tomorrow or when you're back in March. Thanks Doctor.
Get him to come tomorrow morning if possible Edward to seeta nazigo hc III in morning
Thanks Dr. Andrew
Gordon am sorry to hear the news about your mother.
Sorry for the sad news. May her soul rest in peace and Gordon we share the pain with you.
It is so sad to hear that. I request my fellow VHTs to contribute 1000 each and to write a letter so show we care about our fellow VHT.
Harriet - I want to inform you about our patient. She says the ears are hearing well and she is able to hear. It is so encouraging.
Gordon it is so sad. I was asking what time is the burial.
Welcome back
How are you today? Dr. Andrew I have not managed to see the child. Family members were not available. I will be able to inform them by the you are back.
OK thanks Edward.
Has been a busy day. Took some pateitbs to Kampala for hearing assessments.
We are now back in Mukono though. I am getting them some lunch as it has been a long day then I drive them back home

Unfortunately two have quite severe hearing loss that even a hearing aid can't help. They have a small young child and it will be important for her to spend time with her relatives that are able to speak and hear well so that her speech develops normally

They said that you should keep up the good work and try find children younger than 10 who might have hearing loss as these have the best chance for rehabilitation. The hearing test even cost 120,000 each. This is how challenging things are here.
The picture of a graph are the findings from a special hearing test called pure tone audiometry.
Thanks Bryan
You're welcome
Gordon may God strengthen you because He is above all.

So my plan tomorrow is to be at the health center 9am-1130am for any final reviews before I leave this week. Then I can go on home visits with Qiana and Jane. What time works for you both ? Ideally before 2pm....
At seeta nazigo now until 1130am.
Helps with follow up and tracking patients who need a second or third visit.
Gordon sorry about the death of your mother but now you know you have grown up. May God strengthen you.
Qiana and Jane - Doctor is going to meet you today. You were complaining but doctor sent you a message he is going to meet you tomorrow at 2pm but you did not read the message.
VHTs I have not seen you bring the condolences. Please bring them and write them down.

Welcome back from where you were. The patient you asked me about I got that patient. Will you be there at Omni Med, I can wait for you at Omni Med so once you have seen Qiana and Jane I can be here with that patient. I will be happy when you reply.
Isabella thanks for the condolence messages. Whom should I give the condolences to, where is the burial.

Hi Harriet I'll be at omnimed at 2pm. Bring the patient there if you need to and I'll see them here.
I was examining the patients ear
Oliver how much should we put as your condolence as we are finalising this.
Hi I am leaving in 30 minutes from Makata. Harriet if you need me to see the patient please get them to come here before 330pm.  Otherwise Bryan and Catherine will be here tomorrow to do a review.

Doctor, you're free to go because I'm looking for the man but can't find him. He has left the place he has been waiting from, his vision is not good so someone has to hold him by hand. You can go. We shall prepare ourselves on 4th and 5th.

Isabella where are you? Are you back home? I am requesting for your help. I've examined X whom we worked on because Doctor has been asking about her but I hadn't got a feed back yet. I've examined her but her ear canal developed about six wounds. It's like I've seen a hole in the other ear. In order to give Doctor the right information, I request you come and help me. If possible I check as you take a photo. If you're there reply to me so I know what to do. Thanks.
Fellow VHTs thanks for the love you have shown us during the burial of Gordon's mother. It's me Francesca.
How are you Qiana? How are your ears now? Do you feel better? We want you to let us know.

I welcome back all those that attended the burial. Thanks for being there for our colleague. Some of us were unable to attend but thank you so much. Thanks for whatever little you offered and for fulfilling your promises.
Ok thanks so much

Well done fellow VHTs of seeta nazigo makata group. You're so quiet today and no one is sending any messages. I send my regards to you all, Francesca, Matthew and others. I also extend my condolences to you Gordon even though I was unable to attend the burial because I was tied up at the moment. I really send my regards to you all Nora, Oliver, Harriet, Dorothy. Keep up the good work even though our boss is not around. We should continue being strong, and sending messages on the internet at least once day. Thanks so much.
Luke, you're saying we are so quiet today yet we sent lots of messages yesterday? Mister today most of us spend the day at our places of worship. Not all of us are Muslims.
Gordon how are you my dear. May god strengthen you. What I was saying the other child who you had given olive oil to. He needed a washout, yet tomorrow the child is going to school. What can we do?

Good morning fellow members, my question is has anyone identified any place of worship we can base to pass on information to our people of Kirijja Butoke? The information we need to pass on is about ears and how we can treat them. If there's any, let us know and we plan how to go about it tomorrow.

Well done Mr. Bryan. This is Luke. Thanks for the work you have been doing all this week. Thanks be to God for keeping you. I was asking for tissues, I don't have them yet. I don't know if you have them there. Tell me if I can come there or given them to Francesca.
Luke come collect them Monday 10am. Now it’s a weekend the office is closed.
First of all I appreciate our supervisor Dorothy, her team, Karl, Nora and the rest for attending the burial of my Aunt. The mother to Gordon. Even me I was in hospital today. I have just come back.
Greetings Mr. Matthew . Sorry about the sick. God will come heal you. How are you that side? Am Nora.
I have read all the messages. I thank all the VHTs. I thank the VHTs for serving the country. I am very happy. I want to thank again people who came for burial. The work you are doing.

Mr. Luke take it slowly because not everyone is doing these things. So look at the age of Matthew and look at the phone he has just got. He hasn't even had a month with it. You have to realise he is just learning things. You too have made mistakes replying on the case group. So take it slowly. Some people have not yet understood these things.

Mr. Matthew sorry for the loss of your Aunt. Sorry for the illness of the leg. I was requesting you that in the group of Seeta and Makata is where you send all your messages. Even if you are talking to Dorothy, God, send it here.

Well done Dorothy. I am here but I don't have the tissues but I apologise because I feel bad wen I see someone posting in the other group. I have offered to help Mr. Matthew. I have seen it is becoming a habit. Sorry if I am harsh in my feedback.
Luke I understood Bryan told you to go on Monday to get the equipment you need but I don’t know why you keep bringing it up. So be patient.
If you are in a rush and have someone you need to work on I will go with you and help with equipment.
That's great Edward. Ideas could be mosques, churches. Other people to inform are  LC1 chair persons, owners of popular shops at trading centers, nursery schools or Primary schools
Well done Mr. Bryan for the work you did today. On Monday I will be working far away. I won't get back until 6pm - is the meeting so urgent? Can't I come at 5pm?

Greetings all VHTs. Thanks for the work you are trying to do. For your VHT and the other work you do. It is true Luke has done a mistake but he has apologised. I request people don't take it so serious wasting time on that.

Greetings my fellow VHTs. This is Harriet. I am requesting you change in how you speak. I've just received the messages because my phone has been off but Luke the language you use is so bad. The other person is elderly. You can see how old he is. He had just got the stuff. You see, I'm not Mr. Matthew's age and I at least know something but it still challenges me. If you get time, you can go and teach him since you know better. You should change how you speak and don't be that rude. I'll be glad when you do.

Edward, concerning that issue, we should use this week for announcing and get a reply. I took initiative and announced in our church. I haven't gone to others though. I announced and told them what's going on but they didn't give me a reply. Some of them went to the VHTs near them and were worked on but others haven't. Let's announce again and see how it goes.

Thanks for talking to Luke about his reply to Mr. Matthew. I request whoever is able to meet him to continue clarifying to him on how to use the groups in a good way. Luke we request you ask for forgiveness from Mr. Matthew as a sign of respect because of his age.

Isabella welcome back from church today. May God bless you. Were you able to talk to your church members about our issue? If not, we organise and do it another day. We want to reach out to all our places of worship.
Edward, I made the announcement because we were with Dorothy in Seeta Nazigo. We told them the issue and also about the dates of 4th and 5th.
God bless you for what you have done. Dates are  4th or 5th of March.

Well done fellow VHTs. Those from places of worship, I welcome you back and safe journey to those who will be going tomorrow. What I don't want that most of you use is speed and commanding. We joined this but there are those who have nothing to do and those who do have what to do. One will not go around announcing. They know how they do their stuff. You need to go slow. You've turned it into a song. When you move around working in the communities, people will see you and they will come to you. Don't think treating ears is the first thing we have had to do. We have treated lots of diseases and sensitized people on a lot of things. I feel like we have started fighting each other which implies we have got nothing to do. Talking a lot doesn't equate to hard work. Go slow and stop pointing out people's mistakes. May be they didn't intend to do it or meant to say something else. You have changed and have gone so far. This is like the 8th training since we were enrolled as VHTs. We have been with Isabella for sometime but have never got any finger pointing. Why is the pressure so much on this? Please change and don't say anything if you got nothing to say.

Well done Edward, I heard about your program moving in the community as we do our work, are we going to do it collectively as we gather people village to village as we used to do or we go on LCs like that of Kirijja Butooke, or Kavule,
Are we supposed to move individually on our LCs as we do our house visits as VHTs?
Hi just a polite and friendly reminder to keep messages polite and friendly! Thanks you and hope you are all having a good weekend

How are you my fellow VHTs, thanks for the work you are doing, this is Harriet. About the other issue we talked about moving in churches, as I told you I had already informed them, but since we were told that we have to first ask for permission, I asked them and some of them accepted, I also encouraged them to bring their friends who have problems with their ears, now on Sunday, I request my fellow VHTs to prepare, those who feel like, come at the church of the born again Christians in Makata, the patients are going to wait for us from there, but we shall work on them after the service, like at 1:30pm. Come with your equipment don't forget them, come prepared such that people can get healed. Amen

Edward, greetings to you. Thanks for all you're doing. The other lady called Miss  X told us when she came to Seeta you worked on her. But again she met us with doctor and told us she feels pain. Doctor examined her and told her she had sticky wax that will need to be removed may be when the other specialists come. We told her we shall tell her the dates they will be coming so she goes to Seeta Nazigo. That's what I wanted to let you know.

Thank you Francesca but I think Edward is not in the seeta nazigo group and makata. What I advise you should do is to look for Edward amongst your contacts, press on the name and then you send him the message. He's in Kavule Kirijja Butoke group. Thank you so much.

Well done my VHTs. I remind you tomorrow is Monday - please drop off your reports at the health centre. If you have not brought them today, bring them tomorrow by 9am. If it is too far for you to come to drop the forms, take it in turns . One person brings one week, another the next week etc. Also those who are collecting equipment tomorrow at the office, go there so you can serve the people as you promised them. Good night.
My friend Dorothy - thanks. Thanks for correcting me. I also forgot.
Well done !!! That's brilliant Harriet.

Thanks for appreciating Dr Andrew. I am happy about it. Let's pray so that people don't forget. Another thing, for God to enable us do well so they're healed and to get the right results from examination. Amen.

Greetings VHTs. Thanks for todays work. Those who went to the churches to do outreach thanks. Dorothy, the messages we sent in this group, what kind of messages do we send? I don't have any patients to see.
Harriet the program is so good. But you ought to remind the people by sending messages like on Tuesday.
We have to send messages for example arranging home visits, encouraging each other, when you have a challenge with a patient in the field, but not just sending anything that is not relevant.
Hi Bryan. The lady we worked on was called Mrs. X. Another one is called X.
Mrs. Francesca - did you go on your second home visit at Mrs. Xs place? The lady you gave olive oil to?
The day you saw me I was just from there. That was the time I washed out the ear.
Is the patient ok?

Good morning VHTs of Seeta Nazigo and Makata, I am going to read the names of VHTs who have follow up - so I want all of you to listen, where you reached with the patients etc. Give us updates about those patients. Francesca, Karl etc. please give us updates about the patients.

Thank you fellow VHTs for everything you did for me, after losing my mum on 21st. Thank you so much. Help me thank Dr Andrew on my behalf because he also did something for me even though he was leaving. Keep up with that good heart and may God be with you.

Thanks very much Bryan. That patient - we lost someone, they are related to Gordons mother. So I went there but didn't find her there. So I referred her to Francesca. So I will ask Francesca if she went there when the lady came back from burial
Harriet, did you go to X's place to find out if his ears are now okay? You know we have been apart for awhile.

Still in my prayers Gordon. Please mobilise those who we have said need to be seen by her on that date. Preferably she will only see patients that VHTs have already seen and NOT first time reviews. If you think a patient needs to be seen by her then you should have reviewed them first and recorded the abnormality. She will be there from 8.30am to 4pm.

Confirmed day for the ear camp!! Dr Brenda from Mbrara will be coming on Tuesday 5th March to seeta nazigo HC III. Please mobilise those who we have said need to be seen by her on that date. Preferably she will only see patients that VHTs have already seen and NOT first time reviews. If you think a patient needs to be seen by her then you should have reviewed them first and recorded the abnormality. She will be there from 830am to 4pm
Karl and Harriet did you follow up on your patients. Karl you had a patient who had wax in the ear.

Well done Bryan. I have got your message, on 18th I have given the patient an appointment, but I didn't find the patient there. So I washed the ear on the 19th. She said she is feeling better, she has no problem. So I did the follow up. Thank you .
Isabella I thought about that patient, but since you the one who knows the patient I thought they were going to come there for the washout, because now I don't know what to do.

Isabella that patient accepted to come and carry out the washout from your place so I will meet you there will the patient. So I waited for you to call me but I didn't see, we also had a seminar in the church that day. That is when we met, so I think the kids told me the patient did not come. I am so weak I don't know if I can manage to go there in the evening. Please help me and go find out about the work we did. Thank you so much.

Bryan the patient you are asking me about comes from Nakosi. We found him at the health center and we asked him who brought you. Thanks for the reply. To answer Edwards point about itching ears. Itching of the ears can be caused by many things. 1. It can actually be caused by putting sticks or cotton buds into the ear... the sticks inflame the ear canal even more and keep the cycle of itching going. 2. It could be the sign of an early skin infection in the ear canal. If the ear canal is very red that might be a sign of infection. 3. It could be caused by a skin problem 4. It could be caused by a lot of wax.
For the pain killers you can give between 500mg - 1g of paracetamol up to four times a day for an adult.
That should be provided by the health center. But if you can't get it there it is easy and cheap to buy over the counter at a pharmacy. Or even steroidal ear drops can help. XBeta is a brand of drop.

Thanks for this suggestion Luke. About the ear hook - we can't do training in that as we don't have permission from the ethics board. The problem with the ear hook is that there is a danger that you can perforate the ear drum . If you find a patient who needs wax removing with the wax hook inform us here and we can come do it.
About the Panadol... We will look into costs and see if we can get a supply to be delivered to the health center.
Thanks Gordon. We can do a case about Tinnitus (ringing in the ear) next week to help train you. Thank you.
Thank you Karl. Sinus is caused from birth. It is a slight abnormality. When the baby is forming in the womb, there are special parts called 'arches' that form the babies mouth, eyes, ears etc.
The first and second arch form the ears - they don't fully close which is why you see a small hole, or 'sinus'/

Most of the time that sinus (or small hole) is ok, but sometimes that sinus can get infected and swollen. That is why we recommend they visit the specialist to have it removed to prevent the infection from occurring.

Thank you Andrew. Greetings my to you all, my suggestion is that we need additional cases like malaria, cough, diarrhoea because this diseases are common in our area and they are the most which disturb our children and also adults. Thank  you so much

Thanks Isabella. We will try create some cases around these issues you mention.
Ok - to clarify -- OLIVE OIL IS NOT A MEDICINE. The olive oil just softens the ear wax to try max it easier to washout. It has no medical benefit.

If you do the washout, but it still fails after you have tried simple washout then make a note of this patient and refer them to us so we can try doing the washout at the ear camp in May. For the eye issue, we will try put together some basic training. It is important we distinguish between eye pain and poor vision though. If it is poor vision there isn't so much we can do as they may need surgery or glasses. If it is an eye infection then they could have antibiotics but we need to try see if we can do some proper training.

Hi Qiana. We can look into the pain killer issue. If you find a child with wound on the outside of the ear, first make sure the wounds are clean and not infected. Second, if the wounds are infected and it is in the ear canal or around the ear they need antibiotic drop. If it is on the pinna they need antibiotic cream.

I think the first set of new cases we will do in addition to ears will concern diahorrea, malaria, pneumonia, TB, HIV etc. As these are common and there are services at the health center to refer these issues to.
We can try come up with some training for eye disease but we need to make sure that if you are trained to identify eye issues there is appropriate treatment and referral options available.
Please feel free to write your own cases by the way like Catherines has been doing. You are free to write your own cases in the case group :)

Good morning my brothers and sisters whom we work together, thank you for the work you are doing, thanks be to God for protecting you, sorry to those who are sick, and those who have lost their loved ones, its only God who can heal everything, I have a question to my fellow VHTs and to our bosses, when I use open vehicles like pick ups, tipper or other cars of the same type, I feel pain in the ears, even on top of the pinna, though I don't use it often, I don't know why it is like that, I see many people using such vehicles ever Monday to Sunday, January to December, can't their ears get problems? Is it only mine with a problem? Or they face it and they don't take it seriously? Because the truth is whenever I travel by such vehicles I get a lot of complications, like pain in the ear, outside the ear, pain on the pinna also I end up not hearing well, are those people not affected especially those who move on big trucks that carry sand or firewood for long distances I need to know why it is like that? Thank you.

Greetings Harriet. Sorry about that problem but as soon as I heard it, I might have got it wrong but my guess was you have an allergy. Personally when I take a walk in coldness especially in the morning, my whole body itches and sometimes my tongue swells. But again you have said your pinna hurts and you experience itching. I think if you feel that way again, you should go for a check up immediately. You never know what kind of disease it could be. I suggest you see someone when you're still feeling like that.  You may be having an infection that worsens in such conditions. That's what I think dear.

How has your day been VHTs? Thanks for the work you're doing. For those that are sick, may God heal you. And for those that have lost their loved ones, may God heal your broken hearts. Tomorrow is Sunday so I request you to follow up any patients you may be having. I say that because it's the most convenient day for that since most people are home all day. My plan is for us to finish up with the already seen patients and then we can embark on seeing new ones in order to attain the numbers we started with or more. Isabella my dear I have been told you're in pain but may God heal you. The rest of you, I wish you a good evening. Those who went for prayers today like Isabella, we thank God. And those who are supposed to go tomorrow, may God enable you to do so.

Greetings Harriet and sorry about that situation. You're not the only one who experiences it. When I travel on a pick up too and I get affected by too much wind, I feel pain in my ears. It feels like piercings inside and around the ear. Compare it to suddenly jumping into water and then you feel pain on your stomach. When you get used to it, the problem ceases to be one. Or if someone pours water on you at once without doing it slowly, you still experience pain. Now the speed of the car is the reason as to why you feel that way but if it's slow, you can't experience it. I don't think there's any other cause.

Hope all VHTs have a blessed Sunday. Thank you Edward for your encouragement . Harriet your ear might be irritated by the cold or the weather. I am happy to look at it for you next week when I'm back in makata.

Greetings my fellow VHTs, I have just returned online, I had no power, Dorothy about the issue you talked of, I have no allergies, it happens whenever I use cars with open roof like pick ups, it affects  me so much, my ears become so heavy I don't understand but when I use other cars I don't feel bad, that is why I was asking about the people using those trucks everyday whether they are not affected as well. Thank you for your advice.

VHT Oliver what you are going to do is to stop using pick ups and trucks, not in a bad way but if you know that is where the problem comes from, because even the Bible says avoid any ways that bring harm, so when you think that it will affect you, don't use the open cars, there is nothing to do.

Edward, who sent you this video of a person who burnt the child's hands?  Because we want to make a follow up as we the para social workers on children who suffer like this, Edward where did you get it from because it has really affected me.

I beg all the VHTs, who ever have seen the video, if you really have a heart and feel touched, we are not only on issues of diseases, but also issues concerning acts like this should be dealt with, if you know of such cases in your area, if you can't handle it alone, tell it to someone who can work on it to see how the condition can be. That's it.

VHTs and our bosses, I would like your advice. In case one day I kill a snake and then after leave it somewhere, and then the insects eat apart of it but again comeback to my house.  In case those insects get in contact with things that I eat,  is it poisonous? Or if they bite me after eating the snake? Does it affect me? What happens exactly? Please advise me because a lot of people in my village may fall prey. That's my question. I request fellow VHTs, Doctor, Bryan, Catherine please tell me because I personally don't know. Thanks so much. Mulungi is sick with malaria and flue but I gave her treatment. May God be with you.

Thanks so much. Harriet your question is so good and it's always good to know something before you get a problem. This is my reply to you. A snake or rather it's body doesn't have any poison but there's a specific place where that poison is. I remember sending you a picture of a woman eating a snake. A lot of people eat snakes like Chinese, Phillipinos and others. Let me look for that photo and send it to your inbox. It means when an insect eats it, it cannot affect you. I think I've replied to your question that insects don't spread venom. Let me send you a photo of the woman eating a snake and she only removed the intestines and the part with poison.

Good morning fellows. I don't know if you have heard about Francesca's condition. Greetings fellow VHTs in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ. Thanks for loving me. Please don't be afraid I'm now okay. But I got so ill yesterday. I was experiencing some piercings right from the legs to the heart. It felt like my heart was getting pulled out and then I would lose energy. I couldn't even speak. But due to people's prayers, I'm now okay. When I got to the health centre, the doctors didn't know where to start from so they referred me. They had no idea what the condition was after explaining it to them. I will be fine only that we got a boda boda accident on our way. It bounced after knocking something and we fell to the other side so I ended up hitting my chest and hand. My hand got some injuries. Anyway the first serious condition is not there anymore but I'm paralyzed now. I can't feel any pain.

Praise God. The most important thing for you is to believe in God and pray. You know Satan has so many plans but when you pray you win. The world has so many problems but we can overcome them through prayers. May He provide for you and bless you.

Good morning fellow VHTs. Too bad our friend got that kind of problem and Gordon thanks for letting us know. Dorothy thanks for calling her to find out how she's doing. Francesca sorry about the sickness and thanks for updating us that you're now feeling better. May God continue fighting for you as we pray for you.

Good morning Francesca dear. I have just seen what happened to you because I was charging my phone. Sorry about the sickness dear. Thank God for healing you. Thank God you survived the accident. Life ain't easy. Let's pray so He can continue healing you. We shall keep in touch. Quick recovery.
Good morning our supervisor. Thanks for the work. Thanks for looking out and updating us about Francesca because some of us had no idea what was going on. I wish you a happy Easter. Have a good day.
I am sorry Francesca. I only just heard all this now.

Francesca may God's name be praised. We glorify Him because you're still breathing. I sent you a personal message and prayer that you have already seen. May the best healer continue healing you. The God who fights our battles should fight for you because we humans cannot. I have told you since He's resurrecting may every disease you have get healed as He resurrects. We give the glory back to God because you still have a lot to do including people to take care of. May God heal you in our Lord Jesus Christ.

Greetings my sisters and brothers the VHTs , our bosses Catherine, Bryan, Dr. Andrew and Hannah. Thanks for the work you're doing. Thank God who has protected you. I praise the Lord because we love each other. I advise you to continue loving one another and care for our sister Francesca. Today we are preparing for Easter tomorrow. My regards to you fellow VHTs. I wish you all a happy holiday but it's so bad what happened to Francesca. Sorry about your sickness. May God help you and thank Him for getting you out of danger. The devil had so many plans but God helped you. Let's continue praying and God will heal you. He gives and takes away.

Now again, I don't know what's going on VHTs. We are getting lots of problems. We are losing and people are falling sick. As Francesca was struggling with her sickness, I was also struggling with my problem over here. My little girl who got a leg injury last time is suffering from malaria. She convulsed and there was no health worker to attend to her. I have spent the whole day at Seeta Nazigo health centre and have just seen the message. Fellow VHTs don't blame me for taking long to sympathise with Francesca but I was attending to my child. Let's continue praying for each other. My regards to you all. It's me Nora.

Isabella, this is my response to you both. I would personally expect that when someone gets a problem, you let everyone know through the group. But if you feel obliged to sympathise with the person/ encourage them, it's better for you to send a personal message. If it's to give them money, others shouldn't know you passed by their home.
